user_question: How can I optimize energy usage for my smart home IoT devices, and can you generate a diagram of an energy-efficient smart home setup?
final_answer: To optimize energy usage for smart home IoT devices, consider using smart thermostats, energy monitoring plugs, and scheduling devices during off-peak hours. Diagram of an energy-efficient smart home setup generated. Recommended brands include Nest for smart thermostats and TP-Link for energy monitoring plugs.
